feed.title: Many Notes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.5.0
entry.content:
Features:

  • Add Authelia and Zitadel OAuth provider
  • Fix Keycloak OAuth provider
  • Read OAuth configurations from cache
  • Tree view panel now opens by default, except on mobile devices
  • Vaults are now sorted by their last opening date

Other:

  • Fix vault export when zip file could not be created
  • Fix Markdown editor issue when parsing selections in the last line
  • Fix rendering issue of file menu when in preview mode
  • Fix issue when opening a file after closing a file in preview mode
  • Improve overall codebase with Rector, Laravel Pint, PHPStan and PHP_CodeSniffer
  • Add architecture, feature and unit tests
  • Add GitHub tests workflow
  • Update all dependencies
  • Improve features, installation, customization and upgrading sections

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.6.0
entry.content:
Enhanced Functionality:

  • Added links, backlinks, and tags functionality
  • Implemented an upgrade system for automatic disk/database upgrades
  • Improved the Markdown editor's selection parser
  • Added default names to Markdown internal links/images
  • Homepage now redirects users to the last used vault.

Bug Fixes:

  • Resolved an issue where notes were not being updated on disk
  • Fix preview mode resetting when opening different file types

Design and Presentation:

  • Improved application layout
  • Improved Markdown styling colors

Documentation and Testing:

  • Added a guide for non-Docker installations
  • Updated screenshots
  • Increased test coverage
  • Updated dependencies

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.6.1
entry.content:
Bug Fixes:

  • Fix Alpine issue when dealing with files #17

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Features:

  • You can now move files and folders within your vaults.
  • Users now have a starter vault to help them get started with Many Notes.
  • Links and backlinks now support all file types (audio, image, video, PDF).

Other:

  • The "Insert Template" action is now located in the Markdown editor toolbar.
  • Fixed an issue when trying to create a folder with the same name as an existing file.
  • Fixed the first login redirect for new users.
  • Added "&" to the list of allowed characters for node names.
  • Installation now includes two additional guides for Docker volumes and MariaDB.
  • It's no longer needed to create an empty database.sqlite file when installing Many Notes for the first time using SQLite.
  • Dependencies have been updated.

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.7.1
entry.content:
Bug Fixes:

  • Fix zeroing of assets when renaming them #26
  • Fix links with UTF-8 characters not working #27
